website_summaries.verdict: This large 100% cowhide leather tote bag can carry all your essentials with ease.
pros: For those needing more room, this tote can hold larger items such as books, laptops, umbrellas, and notebooks
Made of 100% genuine crazy horse leather, which actually improves in appearance with wear and will add to the vintage look of this bag
Zipper-secure detachable pouch is a nice bonus
Bag comes with a six-month quality guarantee
cons: A few complaints about craftsmanship or staining on clothes from leather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is gorgeous, I have not had the same issues as others. Mine did not discolor clothes or start to rip at the seams. I put a lot in my bag & am not very gentle. It’s held up wonderfully. I love the pouch that comes with it. *Update: I’ve now owned my bag for 6 months. The leather has soften. No rips or tears to the straps or seams. It’s been my main bag since I purchased it. Still my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Frye bags
customer_reviews.text: This bag is gorgeous! I’m ordering the dark brown immediately. This is better than the 4 Frye bags that I own at a fraction of the cost. Wow! I’ll update if there are any future issues with stitching and leather falling apart. It’s December 18th and my bag is still perfection! I’ve had it for about 2 1/2 months (carried everyday since it arrived) and it’s held up wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Jsweet8

customer_reviews.title: Handmade- beautiful, sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m a paralegal and in law school- I drag this bag around EVERYWHERE with me. It’s replaced my other purses as well- large enough to double as a brief case/ purse. My law books are huge and this bag holds up so well. The guy who handmakes the bag is very nice- sends a little handsigned letter along. And the little inside pouch is perfect! Can’t recomend this bag enough
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.text: Thick leather, and made very nice. great size. I debated between this and one from Baseballism, and figured I'd try this bag before spending more than double for Baseballism. Im happy with my choice. I do wish this bag had some small pockets to hold my car keys or phone. The second smaller bag that this comes with does come with small pockets on the inside, but I don't plan on using the smaller bag inside of the main leather bag. I would recommend this bag to others. I would like to see it in black too.
customer_reviews.author: MamaPb

customer_reviews.title: The sewing came undone
customer_reviews.text: Nice but poorly sewed! Mine was coming undone the moment I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this leather tote. It's very well made, the leather is beautiful and soft. I love the aged / rugged look. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: F. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Received it today and absolutely love it. It is better quality than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and absolutely love it. It is better quality than I thought. It is a true soft leather with strong stitching and lots of room. No lining to rip apart after time of use, buckles or zippers to break. Has a strong leather strap made of same leather,, no man made crap. Purchased the lighter brown color and will have the awesome distressed look after use. Can say enough about it. My NEW FAVORITE bag I will carry every day.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bag!
customer_reviews.text: The leather is amazing! The construction is impeccable and simply beautiful. An absolutely outstanding bag for the cost. A purse shoppe owner thought I paid over $300.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Julie M.G

customer_reviews.title: The bag looks just a pictured (dark brown) I also bough the other color but didn't like it so I returned it
customer_reviews.text: FIRST IMPRESSIONS: The bag looks just a pictured (dark brown) I also bough the other color but didn't like it so I returned it. The bag has a board at the bottom to keep the bag upright and the leather is a bit stiff but I think helps the bag maintain its shape. The bag that was included is cute with lots of space to hold misc items however, it is very large and may take up too much space in the tote...depending on what else you have in the bag. Others have mention poor craftsmanship but as I said this is my first impression so I can't comment on that. For the price it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Sturdy & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit, I’m a purseaholic...i have Pradas to Brightons to Coaches- but THIS is my new favorite. Simple, natural, rustic leather(I oil/waxed mine) great size & the insert completes the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2.5 Years Ago and I STILL Use It and Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This purse is one of the best purchases I've ever made. Real, high quality leather and large enough to carry more than just a wallet and phone. I really love it. Any wear the purse receives just adds to it's charm! The look of it never gets old and it goes with pretty much anything. I even use it quite often as a "personal item" carry onto planes because it is generous in space.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Love the unfinished look of this bag perfect size and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the unfinished look of this bag perfect size and very study. Great Saturday shopping bag, great for school and small lap tops. Love everything about this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Blue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag, awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is AWESOME. It was delivered quickly and looks exactly like the pictures. The leather is soft, not too stiff at all. The inside of the bag is very roomy and the the little bag that comes with it is super convenient. I carry it as a purse but it could easily carry notebooks, a text book or two or even your laptop. DEFINITELY worth the price, I receive compliments on the bag all the time. A bag of this quality could easily sell for two or three times this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for those who carry a purse AND a laptop or iPad.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite tote! Big enough to put my Macbook or iPad in and the insert holds my “purse” items. I hate brief cases, laptop bags, all that crap. Now this tote is all I need. Fabulous heavy duty leather that just keeps getting scratched up and distressed, which makes it even more amazing! I am so happy I sprung for this bag. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Meckling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather bag
customer_reviews.text: I compared it to my quality name brand bag in thickness, durability and quality and my word this bag is absolutely gorgeous and ten times stronger. I purchased the dark brown leather and received a discount which was wonderful 😉 The leather is thick, strong and sturdy and the added makeup case/ bag is made of fabric and bordered with the same strong beautiful leather the bag is made of. My hope is that I won’t have the same experience some of the other reviewers stated they had with the stitching that came apart. Honestly I don’t expect that at all and will actually be purchasing the red brown version of the purse.
customer_reviews.author: Voiceu

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome. It's high-quality leather
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. It's high-quality leather, and very well-made. It came quicker than I expected it. It's my new favorite purse. I carry it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Be8ee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty leather tote
customer_reviews.text: If you want a heavy duty tote this is it. For me it’s actually more then I need but it’s beautiful and I’m keeping it! Just as pictured. This bag can hold a lot. My only wish was that the little bag that comes with it would have a removable shoulder strap. I would use that for a quick trip into the store with my essentials in it instead of taking the big tote. But it’s a clutch bag, to easy to get taken or left behind. I need a strap. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Smells weird when you open it... but it's an awesome bag! I actually saw a girl with one and asked her where she got it and she sent me the amazon link! The bottom is firm and doesn't sag when you fill it, the leather allows you make it truly unique with the everyday wear and tear marks. Not to say that it's not durable! It's very durable, I just like when you can truly make something yours. The bag that comes inside it is also awesome, I use it for my travel stuff when I go on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag. Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Beautiful, thick leather that will age well. My only (minor) gripe is that the handles are a bit thin, considering how much the weight the bag can hold. I recommend to the maker of the bag that a handle/strap cover be added to the design to make the handles easier on your fingers and shoulders while carrying it. Other than that, nice bag. I also like the interior purse that came with it, which thankfully has pockets because the bag itself doesn't have any.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Like It But Not as Dark as I Hoped
customer_reviews.text: This tote bag sits flat on the floor, which is a great feature I was looking for. It also has one big compartment, which is also something I was looking for. The quality is good. The leather is soft. But it is not as dark as the picture. I am keeping it because it has those required features.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Amorelli

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse! The only thing is I've already had to get one of the straps re-stitched on. But it is a wonderful bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I almost spent $200+ on a similar bag and am so glad I found this one. I was specifically looking for a deep bag with no metal buckles or chains on the straps, a roomy strap drop for wearing on my shoulder, raw edge leather, and great natural-looking color and finish on the leather. I am thrilled with my bag.
customer_reviews.author: LRC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fake leather
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fake leather. It looks nice, and has a very, very fake leather smell to it. Almost like a leather shop, but artificial. You can't tell it's fake until you look closely and realize the suede is actually just fabric threads. You can also see the weave of the fabric on the "suede" side. As long as it holds up and keeps looking like leather, I'll be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking everywhere for this bag. I am very pleased with this. Only one disappointment that the bag doesn’t look like the picture. The picture shows a different color on the middle panel sort of like a stripe. My bag is one solid color. It’s still very nice for the price! I will keep it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin G

customer_reviews.title: Tie fell off immediately
customer_reviews.text: Within 24 hours the strip that hooks around the button in front untied and fell off somewhere. It’s a cute bag, but I suggest you secure that piece as soon as you open the package.
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Love this tote!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Smells awesome. Very roomy inside. The extra zipper bag inside is a plus if you want to use it. It just matches my warmer brown colors for winter very well. You can use it dressing up or casual.
customer_reviews.author: Wreck_Tangle

customer_reviews.title: Raw cut leather is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I didn't think I would need the small bag in it until I realized there aren't any pockets or zippers inside it so I am using the small bag now. This bag is beautiful. The raw cut leather is just awesome and I have had several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Winters

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. It is the perfect size. I love the look and smell of the leather. I may need to reinforce the seams at some point but for this price I am ok with doing that. As others state the seams are glued and sewn but not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: VMiller

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag, but the decoration on the front fell off within a week. I was disappointed about that since it is not near as cute with just the hole where it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Leslie

customer_reviews.title: and super well stitched
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just Could not Belive the Quality of this Bag! I can say it was money well spent and the Authentic Leather Look and Smell, and super well stitched, Wife Loved it at 1st Sight and Great Delivery and Fast I can say they do treat their Clients Well.
customer_reviews.author: RoyRodriguez2375

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag on my wish list for about a year and finally decided to purchase it. I love this bag, the leather is so pretty and I will be able to fit all of my junk inside including my laptop. Love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful. It is not heavy and is very spacious. It comes with an extra separate zippered bag that is removable on the inside for your phone, wallet and small items. I am very happy with my purchase. I have already gotten a ton of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: The best bag I've ever had. It literally gets better with time. The way the leather gets after a few weeks is better than I expected. If you have a few scratches, no big deal. I just buff them out with a leather wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, I got excited just pulling this out of the box because of the great leather smell!. With wear, this bag will only get better. My only wish is that the straps were a little longer but alas, I am very happy with this bag as it holds everything that I need it to. Also the small carrier inside is very cute and helps with organization. I did also look at higher priced bags like Michael Kors and Coach. For the price, I think I made out much better.
customer_reviews.author: AMer

customer_reviews.title: craftmanship is poor!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag but.......the stitching is very poor. I have only used it a week and I am not faced with either sending it back or finding a leather worker to fix the lose stitches. The entire side of one of the straps is coming unravelled. Very upsetting for a bag that costs over 100.00.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Brummer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this purse. The fact that it is genuine leather and the size holds everything. The second bag that is included is very roomy and holds a lot of stuff and the smell of the leather is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Sleek, well made, beautiful. I wouldn't use it for International travel with the opened top but it is perfect for local travel and Bible study classes and times I have alot to carry. Will be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Spaanem

customer_reviews.title: She loves is because it not only looks good but it holds a ton of paperwork as well ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a teacher and uses this as her work bag. The leather is top notch and the build quality is outstanding. She get complements on it daily from her co workers. She loves is because it not only looks good but it holds a ton of paperwork as well as her laptop. Highly recommend this bag to anyone looking for a large single pocket leather bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a genuine leather tote with the firm bottom to help hold its shape. This bag is just what I wanted, rustic but excellent quality. It is well made and finished. The inner zipper bag is really big, so I put smaller bags inside to help me organize more. Sometimes I'll take out the zipper bag and just put my purse in instead. I can fit my purse, ipad, water bottle, umbrella and dress shoes inside so I only carry one bag on commute. I hope it wears well, because I love, love love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: kristin crowell

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very, very nice bag! I was Leary buying a leather handbag from Amazon, but this is perfect. It was a Christmas gift for my mom and she absolutely loves it. She's only had it 6 weeks, but so far she's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine F.

customer_reviews.title: The bag has already fallen apart and was made cheaply ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag has already fallen apart and was made cheaply. On the night side, it was cute while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, I get compliments on it all the time! In the more it gets used the better it looks.
customer_reviews.author: RFDL55

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now!! Sturdy, beautiful leather tote for work or personal use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! It looks rich and it has held up very well! I tote around my 15" laptop and binder and it is great! No marks on my white sweater and no odor! It is a steal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan'smom

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, thick leather, stands on its on
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a present for my friend. Cannot use it to write more. All I can say is that is has excellent stitching. I wonder if it holds when used? it has a leather odor, but bearable, not awful at all. The inside bag is very well made. The colour is much darker than the picture, which was a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: DeeBee

customer_reviews.title: This bag is amazing. I just spent $350 on a Dooney & ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing. I just spent $350 on a Dooney & Burke bag but instantly fell in love with this bag as soon as I received it and switched immediately. Great quality and feel. Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Brahier

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy leather tote!
customer_reviews.text: Strong solid leather! Sturdy and stiff enough to stand on its own. I like how the leather wears gently. Others have said it goes over your shoulder easily but I would have to disagree with this. I can only ha d carry it which does get frustrating a bit. Great price for good quality.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaLee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is better than I expected. Great quality leather. Nicely made. Very big inside and comes with the cutest insert(which is removable). I get a lot of compliments on it and it goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: The Wellness Homesteader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Edit, 9 months post purchase: Still love this bag. Has held up great, gets more vintage looking with age. The leather circle for the clasp came off somehow so was bummed about that (my kids probably untied the leather strings and thus it came off). Has a rustic, sturdy look to it, the insert is great and it is still in the same great shape it was when I got it. Definitely real leather, not sure why other reviewer insists it's fake. Original review: Love this bag! Happy with the quality and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and distressed look of this bag. It’s unfinished look is perfect for casual carry. I’ve not noticed the color rubbing off as others have commented but I also haven’t used it too much yet as I carry a diaper bag right now :) Excited to get great use out of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous purse! High quality leather that looks good as it gets distressed. It also comes with a large pouch so it's easier to find everything because it's not all floating at the bottom. I took a chance on ordering this based on reviews and I'm so happy I did. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meuche

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful crafted bag that was worth the money. I use it to carry my work files and laptop. It have received so many compliments on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: delaware10

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather, but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but very heavy and no inner pockets, gave it to my daughter to use
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag! I use it daily to take things back and forth to work (lunch, water bottle, and jacket). I use the small bag inside as my purse which helps me stay organized. This bag is stylish and the color doesn’t rub off on my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: JB45

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I always check the reviews before purchasing anything on Amazon and I was not disappointed with this purchase. I just received it and time will tell, but the tote looks very well made, very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathaleene

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. Stitching seems to be lacking at seams... will test and resubmit review if necessary. Definately real leather. Large.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Steele

customer_reviews.title: made well and love the shape and size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark brown, but think I may have gotten the wrong color, was very dissappointed in the color, made well and love the shape and size. Color looks nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning. Make sure you use the right product
customer_reviews.text: OMG this purse is perfect. I love it. The size just right, the color is beautiful. Just the short time ive had it so many compliments on this purse. The smell....I LOVE IT!! Thank you PS....it arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful handbag! Minor stitching issue
customer_reviews.text: I really love this handbag. I like the casual distressed look of it. One of the seams started to unstitch, but it was easy enough to sew it back up and secure it. I still don’t have any regrets in purchasing it!
customer_reviews.author: amhow

customer_reviews.title: Freaking love it !!! QUALITY WITHOUT PRICE TAG
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag omg !!! I purchased it to use as my work bag but honestly I’ve been wearing it outside of work too . The bag on the inside is such a plus. I wish I could give it 10 stars !
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I take the middle section out and carry my lap top, journal and a small pouch with my make-up. This bag has the room for what you need to carry and it is real leather!
customer_reviews.author: M. Beauchaine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 100% leather bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, natural leather bag. I get so many compliments on this bag! It comes with a smaller cute zipper (removable) bag inside. It’s of very good quality. Holds my iPad and small laptop. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag so much! I know this is real leather, but it scratched so easily and it bothered me. I tried leather conditioner, but it still didn’t stop the scratches from showing. I was sad to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but....
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much. It’s an amazing size, the quality of the leather is amazing and m the inside bag it comes with is perfect. Tbe only problem is is that the little part tbe strap hooked to for closing the bag fell off. Now there’s a hole in my bag and it looks dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L Skeen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tote for the price and quality of the leather!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! Superior cow leather and you get a bonus travel case inside! Lot and lots of room for overnights, carry ons for flights, laptop, iPads, lunches, you name it! Lightweight and can easily carry on your shoulder. The price for this product is amazing! MUST HAVE especially for the pure leather fanatics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag and have gotten MANY compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and have gotten MANY compliments. However one if the seams, starting at the top (no stress or tension on it) is already ripped about 2 inches down.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Z.

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for the distinctive, darker coloring in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the distinctive, darker coloring in the photo and that is not what I received. It came to me much lighter and all one color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Good find!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this purse - exactly what I was looking for! The insert pouch is great! Keeps the small stuff organized! I carry appointment book and tablet in one place! Felt it was sturdy and will travel well.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Breese Holz

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can take it right from summer to ...
customer_reviews.text: Always getting compliments on this bag! I love that I can take it right from summer to fall - it goes with everything!! Might buy another as "backup" in case mine ever wears out... which might be a while because it's TRUE QUALITY folks. Haven't had leather this nice in ages! Thanks Jack&Chris!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Staple Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have received so many compliments on this purse. It is a great size and the insert helps provide amazing organization. The leather quality is impeccable and the color does not rub off on your clothes. Thinking this purse will last me several years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quility leather purse
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any negative comments to make related to this purse crafted beautifully and very sturdy. I will definitely purchase another purse from this company.
customer_reviews.author: SanG

customer_reviews.title: Quality.  Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to use as a purse because it is large, sturdy and thick. It is quality craftsmanship and very nice for the price. Oh and I almost forgot to mention, you get a zipper bonus bag inside!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Belado

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I used the bag one time the side thread began to unravel.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great bag... but
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these bags... I have one in the more rustic and then this darker refined one. I love them... except this second one after using ink 2 months has a strap that has come unsewn. I hate that it happened. Really do love the bag and the leather is great.
customer_reviews.author: I’d rather be reading ...

customer_reviews.title: Just right :)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Saw someone with similar bag and they pointed me to this seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purse, well worth the $81 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s gorgeous!!! I’m so glad I bought this purse! Matching bag is so cute, really pleased with it. Better quality than a lot of expensive, trendy brands.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse1882

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great, it looks beautiful, holds up well to be thrown around the car, tossed on the floor, and the general storage that comes with being a mom and a nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Mallery

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just what I was looking for, a nice looking large bag that I could carry my computer and other work paper, a smaller purse and my lunch. It’s great and stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: pretty but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bag but unfortuentley not what i was looking for. Needed a bag for work and the shoulders are entirely too short for what i wanted. Returning the tote.
customer_reviews.author: I value your review

customer_reviews.title: Great leather bag!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag and I am very pleased. I wanted a sturdy, rugged "real" leather bag for everyday use and this bag is it! I was worried that the straps would be skinny or thin but they are not! I read that it may have a strong leather smell ( which I actually like) but it does not. It is a good size and not too big for my petite frame. It is the same color as my brown Bed Stu boots which is what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Debby L. Moritz

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the right size for your laptop, notebook, and charger. I put my charger cable and a spare phone charger in the pouch, along with some pens, hand lotion, and a few other essentials. I have gotten a ton of compliments on this!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag...beautiful finish and color
customer_reviews.text: I use it to carry my current knitting project ....love the separate bag to zip small items....great price nice big size...beautifully done
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bag.... very stylish.... worth the money... got it for traveling and it was packed to the top and it was holding ALOT!! And im a very picky person....
customer_reviews.author: Linipoo 🏌🏾‍♂️

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my tote bag. Nice sturdy quality. Stitching hasn't failed at all yet. I love the plaid interior zipper bag - it has a pocket for my keys and cell phone and the rest is roomy enough for my wallet, a makeup bag, and other various things I carry in my purse. The bag is fairly large but I don't mind it at all. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful - it's just my style and I love using it for work or as a tote bag when I travel. The only thing I would change which would make it perfect in my book would be to add an outer pocket for easy access to my phone. My husband will be happy to hear I can stop searching for the perfect bag!
customer_reviews.author: craz3z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Holds my laptop, tablet, and phone with ease. Perfect for travel, off site meetings, or daily use. Leather is good quality, and perfect for fall wardrobe. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Deyjiavuu

customer_reviews.title: I love this purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse. It is so well made... I love cowhide. ... it is reall cow, so it will scuff ... but that is the beauty for me. Best purse Ive ever bought. And the pouch inside is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JESUS LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! This bag was everything I wanted and more!! So cute, smells fantastic and the cute smaller bag is extra bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert padalecki

customer_reviews.title: It's durable!
customer_reviews.text: Gets better looking with age. I put a ton of heavy camera equipment in it. Had it since 2015. The straps thread started coming loose but my husband fixed that.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love style, durability, and price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of this bag. Leather is heavy duty and stitching is too! I load my purses up and this one can handle all my things. Love the insert but wish it had sturdy sides instead of being flimsy. Overall super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. Straps could be 2-3 inches longer for perfection.
customer_reviews.author: mycatemmy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag!! I bought it to use for work and it hasn't disappointed. I carry a laptop and lots of files, so it gets put to the test. It wears perfectly and I love the antiqued look. I have gotten a ton of compliments on it and people think I spent a lot more than I did!
customer_reviews.author: Gizzmo

customer_reviews.title: The plaid tartan inside bag is adorable and both bags are durable and very timeless//stylish
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this bag. I recently used as my carry on item when flying. The plaid tartan inside bag is adorable and both bags are durable and very timeless//stylish. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne D'Elia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag gets 5 stars all around from me... the *only* change I would make to it, would be that it have a slightly longer handle so that it's easy to slide onto your shoulder. That's why I gave it 4 stars in 'for Traveling' category.
customer_reviews.author: kalexander0206

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect replacement for my work bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect replacement for my work bag. It fits my 15 in laptop, a notebook, and my planner with some room left for cords and my pen bag. Love the coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This tote is everything!
customer_reviews.text: This tote is everything! I have used it every day since it arrived. I’m most impressed by the quality of the leather. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: This purse is very distressed and marks up easily. Ot looks like true soft leather
customer_reviews.text: This purse is very distressed and marks up easily. Ot looks like true soft leather. I love it. It smells so good too. If you live the smell of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes the bag and thinks it will last her a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’m a very picky person when it comes to leather and this is just like what my custom harness lady would Make for me. A GREAT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Gorgeous!! The quality of this bag has meet my expectations and more!!! Best purchase through Amazon so far and I shop here quite frequently.😁
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day to work, holds a lot of items love the smaller bag that came with it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

feature_bullets: 100% Cowhide Leather Tote Bag with a Detachable Canvas Pouch

CHILD with MUM BAG STRUCTURE: a big baseball purse with a small plaid canvas bag, 2 in 1 set called mother and child bag. The separated zipper child bag may keep girls'/ladies' individual stuff more privately lol. With 1 big main pocket; 1 inner removable zipper pouch(inside the pouch: 1 x zipper pocket, 2 x small open pockets for cards, phone)

REAL LEATHER TOTE BAG DIMENSION: (Length x Height x Width) 13.3 down /15.75 up x13x5.5 inch =34 down/40up x33x14 cm, net weight: 2.1 Pounds. The pouch size: 11.81x9.06x3.93 inches /30x23x10 cm, net weight: 0.6 Pounds. The reality tote handbag is bigger than pictures looking. IF you are looking a Big tote/handbag, this handbag you deserve it.

15 INCHES LAPTOP LARGE TOTE BAG：roomy capacity leather tote that can hold books, journal, holding up to 15 inch laptop, umbrella, notes and other things you daily use. It is perfect for shopper tote, business tote, work tote, teacher tote, school tote bag, daily tote.

100% GENUINE LEATHER & CHARACTERISTIC: Made of heavy duty First Layer cowhide leather, also be call "Crazy Horse Leather ", which will be more glossy after about half year of using. Some nature scratch will help add crazy-horse leather bag's character. Due to the different display and different light, the picture may not reflect the actual color of the item. Thanks for your understanding. And this is the AUTHENTIC high-quality leather Jack&Chris tote bag! Pls Don’t accept cheap imitations.
